zero_state.title: You have no activity yet
zero_state.description: Once you start using the platform, your activity will show up here.

zero_state.title: You have no {tab} bounties
zero_state.description: It looks like you don't have any {tab} bounties at the moment. Enter a title for a new bounty here to get started creating one!

zero_state.title: Could not find that bounty
zero_state.description: Try refreshing, or make sure your url is correct

meta.label: bounty
meta.tooltip: Private bounties require that users apply to fulfill the bounty. Once you are approved by the issuer, you may submit a fulfillment for this bounty.

issue_rating.issuer1: Your bounty submission was accepted! If you would like, you can rate your experience with the following bounty issuer:
issue_rating.issuer2: This will help set expectations for other fulfillers on the platform.
issue_rating.fulfiller1: You accepted a submission to your bounty! If you would like, you can rate your experience with the following fulfiller:
issue_rating.fulfiller2: This will help set expectations for other issuers on the platform.

applicant_card.declined_message: Your declined application status is only visible to you

zero_state.title: There are 0 applicants
zero_state.description: Applicants to this bounty will appear here.

zero_state.title: There are 0 comments
zero_state.description: Submit a comment using the form above.

zero_state.title: There are 0 submissions
zero_state.description: Submissions to this bounty will appear here.
zero_state.private_description: The submissions for this bounty have been set to private.
zero_state.bounty_owner_description: Submissions to this bounty will appear here and will only be visible to you. Additionally, fulfillers will be able to see the submissions that they created.

submissions_card.notice: Submissions to this bounty are hidden.
submissions_card.bounty_owner_notice: The submissions are only visible to you and the fulfiller.
submissions_card.fulfiller_notice: Your submissions are only visible to you and the bounty issuer.

new_bounty.title: Discard Changes?
new_bounty.description: If you decide to leave this page, the changes made to your bounty will be discarded and your bounty will be reverted to its previous state.

draft_or_edit_bounty.title: Discard Changes?
draft_or_edit_bounty.description: If you decide to leave this page without creating a draft or activating, your bounty will be discarded.

activate_dead_form.title: Re-Activate your bounty
activate_dead_form.description: Indicate an amount for your deposit to activate the bounty. At minimum, your deposit must match the payout amount ({minimumBalance} {token_symbol}).
activate_dead_form.min_deposit_warning: At minimum, your initial deposit must match your payout amount.

activate_draft_form.title: Activate your bounty
activate_draft_form.description: Indicate an amount for your initial deposit to activate the bounty. At minimum, your initial deposit must match your payout amount of {minimumBalance} {token_symbol}
activate_draft_form.min_deposit_warning: At minimum, your initial deposit must match your payout amount.

contribute.title: Increase the balance
contribute.description: Indicate the amount you would like to contribute towards the bounty ({token_symbol}).
contribute.description_issuer: Indicate the amount you would like to add to the bounty ({token_symbol}).

extend_deadline_error.title: The deadline must be in the future in order to activate your bounty.

extend_deadline_form.title: Extend Deadline
extend_deadline_form.description: Indicate the time that you would like to extend the bounty deadline until {timezone, select, null { } other { (timezone={timezone})}}

fulfill_bounty.title: Enter Submission Details
fulfill_bounty.description: Enter and submit the details for your bounty submission, including any links to content that may be required for fulfillment as indicated by the bounty description. You may format your submission description using Markdown.

form.private_notice: All information entered here will be stored on the public Ethereum network, but will be hidden on the site.
form.public_notice: All information entered here will be stored on the public Ethereum network, and will be publicly displayed on the site.

fulfiller_application.title: Enter application details
fulfiller_application.description: Describe why you believe you would be a good fit to complete this bounty. Feel free to also provide links to relevant work or experience.

increase_payout.title: Increase bounty payout
increase_payout.description1:
Indicate the amount you would like to increase the payout to. You may include an additional balance to cover the costs.

Your total balance must be greater than the new prize amount ({token_symbol}). The current balance is: {minimumBalance, number} {token_symbol}. The current payout amount is: {minimumPayout, number} {token_symbol}.
increase_payout.description2:
Indicate the amount you would like to increase the payout to.

Your total balance must be greater than the new prize amount ({token_symbol}). The current balance is: {minimumBalance, number} {token_symbol}. The current payout amount is: {minimumPayout, number} {token_symbol}.
increase_payout.balance_warning: The balance of your bounty must be greater than the payout amount.
increase_payout.payout_warning: Your payout amount must be greater than the previous payout amount.

kill_bounty.title: Are you sure you want to de-activate your bounty?
kill_bounty.description: If you change your mind, you can always re-activate it again later.

transfer_ownership.title: Transfer Ownership
transfer_ownership.description: Include the wallet address of who you would like to transfer the bounty to.

zero_state.title: Could not find that bounty
zero_state.description: Try refreshing, or make sure your url is correct

create_bounty.deposit_warning: Deposit amount must at least match the payout amount.
create_bounty.payout_warning: Payout amount may not be larger than the balance.

default.label: Default
default.about: This is a short description of the template that has been selected above. It provides some insight into how this template might be used, in addition to some potential example use cases.
default.description:
# Description
Describe the bounty that you want completed.
What is it for?
What does it involve?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any pre-requisites needed to complete it?

 - Requirement one
 - Requirement two
 - Requirement three

# Definition of Done
What should bounty fulfillers submit as proof that they have completed the bounty? What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note 
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

proof-of-action.label: Proof of Action
proof-of-action.about: Proof of Action bounties are useful when participants are asked to complete a task in the real world, and must deliver proof to receive a reward.
proof-of-action.description:
<!-- Background -->
Describe yourself so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are managing this bounty as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Task Description
Describe the task that you want completed.
What is it for?
Is this bounty for simple task completion or is it part of a larger vision/project?
Can this bounty be repeated for multiple awards or will only one submission per person be accepted?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any pre-requisites or credentials needed to complete it?

- Requirement one
- Requirement two
- Requirement three

# Proof of action
What should bounty fulfillers submit as proof that they have completed the bounty?
What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

code.label: Software Development
code.about: Code bounties are useful when participants are asked to write or analyze code for you, by contributing to an existing codebase or creating a brand new one.
code.description:
<!-- Client background -->
Describe yourself (the client) so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are seeking development services as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Project scope
What is the project for?
Is this for a private or open-source project?
Does an [issue](url) currently exist for this development task?
Do you need to provide a brief to follow?

## Requirements
 What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any techincal pre-requisites or credentials needed to complete it?

* Item one
* Item two
* Item three

## Resources 
Make sure to provide any resources the fulfiller might need in order to complete this bounty (assets, repositories, permissions, etc...).
Describe them briefly and if there are any guidelines that should be followed when using them or getting set up.

- [Resource 1](url):
- [Resource 1](url):

# Definition of Done
What do bounty fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted (eg a [link](url) to a pull request or issue)
List the final expected deliverables.

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

graphic-design.label: Graphic Design
graphic-design.about: Graphic Design bounties are useful when participants are asked to create or analyze designs for you, delivering feedback or finished work.
graphic-design.description:
<!-- Client background -->
Describe yourself (the client) so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are seeking services as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Project scope
What is the project for?
Is it part of a branding campaign?
A product?
What kind of design deliverables are you seeking?
Will the deliverables need to be formatted to be usable in different contexts (web, print, vector, raster, etc..)?
Is the project large enough that it might require multiple bounties?
Do you expect revisions?

## Audience, Tone, Style, & Feel
Who is the audience for this design?
What kind of tone do you need to portray?
Does the design need to be consistent with a brand or theme?

## Resources
Make sure to provide any resources the fulfiller might need in order to complete this bounty (assets, repositories, etc...).
Describe them briefly and if there are any guielines that should be followed when used.

- [Resource 1](url):
- [Resource 1](url):

# Definition of Done
What do bounty fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?
List the final expected deliverables.

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

idea-generation.label: Idea Generation
idea-generation.about: Idea generation bounties are useful when participants are asked to share their thoughts or ideas on a particular topic, problem, or solution.
idea-generation.description:
<!-- Background -->
Describe yourself so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are managing this bounty as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Concept
Describe the concept behind this idea generation exercise.
Is it a one-off experiement or part of a larger vision/project?
Are you looking to receive as many responses as possible or will you only be accepting a limited number of submissions?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any certifications or pre-requisites needed to complete it?

- Requirement one
- Requirement two
- Requirement three

# Definition of Done
What should bounty fulfillers submit as proof that they have completed the bounty?
What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?
What format or media does the submission need to contain (eg a written response, a video, etc...)?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

feedback-and-critique.label: Feedback and Critique
feedback-and-critique.about: Feedback and critique bounties are useful when participants are asked to share their thoughts or options on a particular idea, topic, or experience, or project.
feedback-and-critique.description:
<!-- Client background -->
Describe yourself (the client) so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are seeking feedback as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Feedback Request
What are you looking for feedback on?
Do you need code reviewed?
Are you looking for individuals to test a product or prototype?
Need some of your dance moves video-reviewed?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any pre-requisites needed to complete it?
Is there a process you would like to follow to obtain feedback or methods you're hoping to use to obtain it (eg video interviews, usability-tests)?

- Requirement one
- Requirement two
- Requirement three

# Definition of Done
What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?
How should feedback be submitted?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

survey.label: Survey
survey.about: Survey bounties are useful when participants are asked to share their thoughts and opinions in survey form, and are rewarded for completion/submission of their survey responses.
survey.description:
<!-- Client background -->
Describe yourself so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are managing this survey bounty as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Survey Description
What are you looking for feedback on?
What is the purpose of the survey and how are the results being used?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any certifications or pre-requisites needed to complete it?
Will you be hosting the survey here or on another platform (eg Typeform, SurveyMonkey, etc...)?

- Requirement one
- Requirement two
- [Survey Link](url) 

# Definition of Done
What should bounty fulfillers submit as proof that they have completed the bounty?
What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted (eg validation of a completed survey)?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

recruitment.label: Recruitment
recruitment.about: Recruitment bounties are useful when seeking participants for a particular role, exercise, or objective.
recruitment.description:
<!-- Client background -->
Describe yourself so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are managing this recruitment bounty as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Description
Post a link to a [job-post](url) or describe the job or project that you are recruiting for.
What are the primary responsibilities of the role?
Is this for a temporary engagement or are you looking for full-time talent?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for this bounty?
Are there any certifications or pre-requisites a candidate needs to qualify?
How should the candidate expect to participate?

- Requirement one
- Requirement two
- Requirement three

# Definition of Done
What do fulfillers need to include in their submission in order to be considered for recruitment (eg a resumé, LinkedIn, written statement, etc...)?
1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Enter your details about this bounty.
about.notice: Enter a title and description for your bounty. A
about.notice2: preview will automatically be generated as you type, which you can view by clicking the preview button. Choose a description template below to get started, or clear the field to create your own.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: Who will be the primary contact for bounty questions and submissions?

details.title: DETAILS
details.description: How should this bounty be classified?
details.notice: Enter the categories and difficulty level for the bounty. Since difficulty can be fairly subjective, it is helpful to provide more details around required experience within your bounty description.

revisions.title: REVISIONS
revisions.notice: Enter the maximum number of revisions you may require for this task, in order to help set expectations for the contributors.

attachments.title: ATTACHMENTS
attachments.description: Does this bounty require any external assets for completion?
attachments.notice: Attach any files or links that may be helpful as references or necessary for a contributor to complete the bounty.

deadline.title: DEADLINE
deadline.description: When will this bounty be due?
deadline.notice: Enter the date and time for this bounty's deadline {timezone, select, null { } other {(timezone={timezone})}}

privacy.title: PRIVACY
privacy.description: Will submissions be visible to everyone?
privacy.notice: Submissions can be hidden from other users if desired.

private_fullfillments.label: Visibility
private_fullfillments.description: Do you want to approve people before they can fulfill your bounty?
private_fullfillments.notice: If you require approval, you will be notified when a user indicates their intent to submit, and will be required to approve them before they are allowed to complete your bounty.

payout.title: PAYOUT
payout.notice: Select the token and enter the amount you will award for completion of this bounty.

fulfillment_amount.label: Payout amount {hasDefaultToken, select, true {} false {(ETH or whole tokens)}}

token_contract_2.label: Token
token_contract_2.placeholder: Select token or enter token address...

payout_editing.title: PAYOUT
payout_editing.notice: Enter the amount you will award for the completion of this bounty. The payout may not be larger than your current balance of {balance} {token_symbol} . If you would like to add more funds to the bounty, please increase your balance.

fulfillment_amount.label: Payout amount {hasDefaultToken, select, true {} false {(ETH or whole tokens)}}

token_contract_2.label: Token
token_contract_2.placeholder: Select token or enter token address...

save.title: SAVE OR SUBMIT
save.description: When would you like to submit and activate the bounty?
save.notice: If you wish to activate the bounty later, you can save it as a draft. The requirements for a bounty can only be edited while it is in the draft stage. At minimum, your deposit amount must match your payout amount.

zero_state.title: No Bounties Found
zero_state.description: Update your search filters to see more bounties

zero_state_error.title: Uh oh, something happened
zero_state_error.description: Try a new filter or refresh the page and try again

zero_state.title: No Results Yet
zero_state.description: As bounties are issues and submissions are completed, this leaderboard will begin to populate

zero_state_error.title: Uh oh, something happened
zero_state_error.description: Try to refresh the page and try again

details.title: Profile Details
details.description: Add some profile details about yourself, so that others on the platform have an idea of your background and skillset, and can find you elsewhere online.
details.description2:
Welcome to the Bounties Network! We're excited to see what you bounty.

Before you get started, we encourage you to add some profile details about yourself, so that others on the platform have an idea of your background and skillset.

address_mismatch.title: Wallet address does not match
address_mismatch.description1: You were previously signed in to
address_mismatch.description4: This address does not match your current wallet account address:
address_mismatch.description5: . Please switch your wallet account, or log out of the Bounties Network and sign in using a different address.

sign_in.title: Sign in and verify address
sign_in.description: After clicking "Continue", a wallet dialogue will prompt you to verify your unique address. Once you verify, you'll be signed in to the network.

signing_in.title: Complete signature request to verify your address and sign in

unlock.title: Secure Wallet Access
unlock.description1: You'll need to log in and/or grant access to your secure wallet (e.g.
unlock.description2: ) in order to use {pageLevel, select, null {parts of} other { }} {networkName}

wallet_required.title: Web3 enabled browser and secure wallet required.
wallet_required.description2: , please install a secure wallet such as
wallet_required.description3: If you'd like help getting set up, take a look at our

wrong_network.title: Foreign network detected
wrong_network.description2: Please switch your active wallet network.

zero_state.title: You have no notifications
zero_state.description: Once you start using the platform, notifications will show here.

zero_state.title: No Reviews Found
zero_state.description: We didn't find any reviews associated with this action.

zero_state.title: No User Found
zero_state.description: Check that the address is correct and try again

unsaved_changes.title: Discard Changes?
unsaved_changes.description: If you decide to leave this page without confirming your changes, the changes made to your profile will be discarded and your profile will be reverted to its previous state.

emails.title: EMAIL NOTIFICATIONS
emails.description: What notifications would you like to receive via email?
emails.notice: Opt in or out of the notifications you wish to receive via email. We recommend sticking with the default settings so that you can be informed of important activity relevant to you on the network.

notification_options.transfer_recipient: Bounty transfer to another user completes
notification_options.bounty_comment_received: A bounty you fulfilled receives a comment
notification_options.bounty_comment_received_commenter: A bounty you commented on receives a comment
notification_options.fulfillment_comment_received_issuer: A submission to your bounty receives a comment
notification_options.fulfillment_comment_received_commenter: A submission you commented on receives a comment
notification_options.bounty_changed: A bounty you fulfilled is changed
notification_options.bounty_changed_applicant: A bounty you applied for is changed
notification_options.fulfillment_updated_issuer: Fulfiller, updates their fulfillment on your bounty
notification_options.fulfillment_submitted_issuer: Fulfiller, submits a new fulfillment to your bounty
notification_options.contribution_received: Another user contributes funds to your bounty
notification_options.bounty_completed: Bounty no longer has enough funds to pay out
notification_options.activity: General activity (updated profile, created bounty, etc.)

photo.title: PROFILE PHOTO
photo.label: Image upload failed, please try again.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: What would you like people to know about you?
about.notice: Enter some of your personal details so that the community can get to know you.

skills.title: SKILLS
skills.description: What are some of your professional or technical skills?
skills.notice: Enter or select the skills for which you are proficient. This will help others on the network be confident in your ability to fulfill certain types of bounties.
skills.label: Skills

social.title: SOCIAL
social.description: Do you have any other social profiles you would like displayed?

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: Where would you like to receive status notifications about your bounties and fulfillments?

marketing.label: I would also like to receive relevant bounty suggestions and platform updates

zero_state.title: You have {currentTab} 0 submissions
zero_state.description: It looks like you don't have any submissions. Come back after you have {currentTab} a fulfillment!

tx_guide.title: Your wallet will take it from here!
tx_guide.description: After clicking "OK", a wallet dialogue will prompt you to confirm your Ethereum transaction and pay a small amount of ETH (for gas fees).
tx_guide.notice: A default gas limit and price will be set for you.

messages.waiting: Waiting for your transaction to be confirmed on the blockchain...
messages.pending_receipt: Your transaction is being processed. We will notify you once it is confirmed.
messages.pending_wallet: Confirming Ethereum transaction with your enabled wallet. This may take a few seconds.

Describe yourself (the client) so that potential fulfillers have some context around who you are, what you do, and if you are seeking feedback as an individual or on behalf of an organization.

# Feedback Request
What are you looking for feedback on?
Do you need code reviewed?
Are you looking for individuals to test a product or prototype?
Need some of your dance moves video-reviewed?

## Requirements
 What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers?
Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty?
Are there any pre-requisites needed to complete it?
Is there a process you would like to follow to obtain feedback or methods you're hoping to use to obtain it (eg video interviews, usability-tests)?

- Requirement one
- Requirement two
- Requirement three

# Definition of Done
What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?
How should feedback be submitted?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty?
Does the bounty require any additional materials or information that either party might need to provide to facilitate effective communication and/or collaboration?

# Description
Post a link to a [job-post](url) or describe the job or project that you are recruiting for.
What are the primary responsibilities of the role?
Is this for a temporary engagement or are you looking for full-time talent?

How should the candidate expect to participate?

notifications.bounty_changed: A bounty you submitted to was updated
